name: Radisson Blu Ridzene Hotel

reviews.text: I just completed a ten day stay at the hotel. I found the staff very cheerful and quite helpful. I stayed in a business class room, so I do not know if my comments apply to other room grades. The room was well furnished and comfortable with a large bathroom featuring a separate shower and bathtub. The room was quiet for sleeping even with the windows open. The room had two double beds, which was fine for a business trip. One big plus was the free Wifi, something most hotels of this quality normally charge you for.
reviews.title: Pleasant stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We visited Riga in early December and stayed at Radisson Blu Ridzene Hotel. The hotel has a superb location in the city centre within walking distance of all attractions. We must praise the staff for helpfulness and good service. The restaurant was excellent and so was the room. If you are looking for a good place to stay visiting Riga, we can recommend the hotel. Coming back to Riga we will certainly stay there again.
reviews.title: Top hotel and top service

reviews.text: This property is a total disappointment. It clearly shows the radisson chains policy of buying up (or it might even be a franchise) hotels and not doing much with them in way of refurbishment.
reviews.title: They call it 5 stars. Its a solid 3

reviews.text: This hotel in my book is a solid 3 star hotel. Looks old and feels old. The building from the outside is classic soviet era design and not much changed inside either. The beds are a disgrace and thou its a 5 star hotel nobody even shows up for a turn down service.
reviews.title: Can't wait to return

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The internet is free and fast and the breakfast is ok.
reviews.title: Location!

reviews.text: There are over 4 radissons in Riga. This is not the best one for sure.
reviews.title: An excellent hotel - highly recommended

reviews.text: Travelled on leisure and shared a room with my 8 year old son. We travelled by car (used the convenient underground parking) and stayed one night, had breakfast and a drink at the bar.
reviews.title: Solid business hotel with perfect location for tourists

reviews.text: The location of the hotel was perfect for our sightseeing of the historic center of Riga as everything was conveniently reachable by walking. Unlike the historic environment, the hotel is a slightly aged modern building, one side facing a major road, that has no particular charm but serves the purpose. The outside terrace looks inviting. We had no time to check out the spa infrastructure.
reviews.title: Fantastic sauna with a view, nice hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The standard rooms are small and a bit non-functional (no place to put the luggage), with big (unnecessary) seating taking up most of the room. When we tried to open the window, the outside chillers of the air-condition were too loud to bear it. Otherwise, everything is as you would expect from a business hotel: the place is well maintained and clean.
reviews.title: Good hotel with nice restaurant

reviews.text: Unfortunately, the service was not as attentive as you would expect from a four star hotel: we had to carry our luggage from the car to the room and squeeze it on a very narrow stair down to the parking garage (no elevator). The occasional smile was rare - maybe, it was the result of the weekend shift? Also, in the breakfast room, it took some time until we obtained the attention of the staff. The restaurant recommended by front desk was a bit inappropriate when traveling with a kid (a club restaurant) but very good.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.text: Overall, the hotel is good and can be recommended for people who do not expect something special.
reviews.title: Great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Somehow already on the check-in I felt some difference in attitude. Difficult to describe, taking into account that the hotel is mostly like many others... I do not know how do they do it, but despite of this you are feeling 5*. Rooms and all the common areas are clean and nicely decorated, staff is helpful and forthcoming. Everything looks quite simple with no luxury, but feels somehow like few where else. Interesting experience and a must for check-it-out if you are visiting Riga often.
reviews.title: One of the few 5* in Riga

reviews.text: I stayed in Latvia for a brief business meeting last month. The room I had at the Radisson was clean, comfortable, quiet, and stylish. If I had been traveling with my husband the bed would have been small, but for one it was fine.
reviews.title: Just one night, but great experience

reviews.text: The hotel positions itself as a 5 star hotel, however it has no more than 4 stars in my opinion.
reviews.title: Not bad, but overpriced for that quality

reviews.text: The rooms are clean, but not that big as a 5 star hotel must have. Also, there is not enough space for luggage.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.text: The location is very good (5 min. by walk from the Old city). The breakfast was also quite good. They have a good gym.
reviews.title: Nice stay

description: Radisson Blu Ridzene Hotel, Riga. A prestigious and elegant hotel by the Old Town invites you into a pleasant atmosphere combining refinement and tradition and offering a balance between the classic and modern. This charming hotel with light-filled, elegantly decorated rooms knows how to preserve its soul and will seduce you with its intimate atmosphere and hospitality. 95 elegant guestrooms including 78 Standard Class, 13 Business Class rooms, 3 Suites and one Presidential Suite. Fine dining restaurant Piramīda - the ideal choice for banquets, weddings and special events. Cozy Bar Ridzene and Library. 7 elegant conference rooms ideally equipped for business meetings. Relaxation centre including gym, sauna with nice city view as well as a range of beauty treatments. Underground parking (for additional fee). Free WiFi - free wireless Internet access throughout the hotel.
